summary: Changes the weight and value of hides, pelts and tusks.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the values and weights of hides, pelts and husks. This can help motivate people to hunt more or help out those who like to hunt but don\'t get much from it.

I like to hunt in Skyrim but I never really got money for it because I use my level up perks for things other than speech cause I think speech is kinda boring. This helps people like me who want more money but don\'t want to use there levelups on speech. 

This mod also lowers the weight of lether to 1. I got annoyed that dear hide had a weight of one but when you turned it in to leather it weighed 2.

Future plans:
-add bear meat
-have venison drop 100% of the time
-increase the number of deer in appropriate places
-make deer run faster
-maybe add some animals? I was thinking squirrels and have had a suggestion for boars (if you have any experience with making models for these and would like to help PM me so we can talk)

List of items with there new values and weights:
[color=limegreen]Item[/color] [color=yellow]Value[/color] [color=cyan]Weight[/color]
[color=limegreen]Bear pelt[/color] [color=yellow]50[/color] [color=cyan]4[/color]
[color=limegreen]Cave bear pelt[/color] [color=yellow]60[/color] [color=cyan]4[/color]
[color=limegreen]Cow hide[/color] [color=yellow]20[/color] [color=cyan]2[/color]
[color=limegreen]Deer hide[/color] [color=yellow]20[/color] [color=cyan]2[/color]
[color=limegreen]Fox pelt[/color] [color=yellow]17[/color] [color=cyan].5[/color]
[color=limegreen]Goat hide[/color] [color=yellow]10[/color] [color=cyan]1[/color]
[color=limegreen]Horker Tusk[/color] [color=yellow]80[/color] [color=cyan]5[/color]
[color=limegreen]Horse hide[/color] [color=yellow]25[/color] [color=cyan]2[/color]
[color=limegreen]Leather[/color] [color=yellow]13[/color] [color=cyan]1[/color]
[color=limegreen]Mammoth tusk[/color] [color=yellow]300[/color] [color=cyan]5[/color]
[color=limegreen]Sabre Cat pelt[/color] [color=yellow]30[/color] [color=cyan]2[/color]
[color=limegreen]Snow sabre pelt[/color] [color=yellow]45[/color] [color=cyan]2[/color]
[color=limegreen]Snow bear pelt[/color] [color=yellow]75[/color] [color=cyan]4[/color]
[color=limegreen]Snow fox pelt[/color] [color=yellow]20[/color] [color=cyan].5[/color]
[color=limegreen]Ice wolf pelt[/color] [color=yellow]25[/color] [color=cyan]1[/color]

Update 1.1 includes:
[color=limegreen]Horker Loaf[/color] [color=yellow]12[/color] [color=cyan]1[/color]
[color=limegreen]Horker Meat[/color] [color=yellow]10[/color] [color=cyan]1[/color]
[color=limegreen]Horse Meat[/color] [color=yellow]15[/color] [color=cyan]2[/color]
[color=limegreen]Leg of Goat[/color] [color=yellow]8[/color] [color=cyan]1[/color]
[color=limegreen]Leg of Gooat Roast[/color] [color=yellow]10[/color] [color=cyan]1[/color]
[color=limegreen]Mammoth Snout[/color] [color=yellow]40[/color] [color=cyan]2[/color]
[color=limegreen]Mammoth steak[/color] [color=yellow]42[/color] [color=cyan]2[/color]
[color=limegreen]Raw Beef[/color] [color=yellow]6[/color] [color=cyan].2[/color]
[color=limegreen]Spiced Beef[/color] [color=yellow]10[/color] [color=cyan].5[/color]
[color=limegreen]Venison[/color] [color=yellow]15[/color] [color=cyan]2[/color]
[color=limegreen]Venison Chop[/color] [color=yellow]20[/color] [color=cyan]2[/color]

If you guys think some of the values and weights should be changed or other things should be added to the list let me know in the comments and I will look into it.

If you like this mod, don\'t forget to endorse if you want. If you don\'t like it, well then don\'t use it.

Installation:
1. place the esp into your skyrim data directory
2. load the esp and play

Also check out my speed rings mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7486
author: sch518
